WorkItem.Description:
Hello Kendal!

First thanks for great Tool! It's very useful.

And than about issue.
In my case when I collected inventory from servers and try to export to Excel I have got error:
Exception calling "Add" with "0" argument(s): "Old format or invalid type library. (Exception from HRESULT: 0x80028018 (TYPE_E_INVDATAREAD))".
After short search I found MS KB http://support.microsoft.com/kb/320369/en-us.
As I understand there is problem when PowerShell and Excel run with non-English OS version (may be non-English Office too).

Please take into account in the next versions Tool.
I resolved the issue by adding this code in PS Module SqlServerInventory.psm1:
[Threading.Thread]::CurrentThread.CurrentCulture = 'en-US'
